
```{r}
# Load xtable
library(xtable)

# Select a subset of mtcars
data <- head(mtcars[, 1:5])

# Convert to LaTeX table
xtable_obj <- xtable(data, caption = "Sample Table Using xtable", label = "tab:xtable")

# Print LaTeX code
print(xtable_obj,
  include.rownames = TRUE,
  floating = TRUE,
  tabular.environment = "tabular",
  sanitize.text.function = identity
)
```
